title: The Importance Of Developing IPs, With Dr. Kyle Kingsley, Vireo Health
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Dr. Kyle Kingsley is founder and CEO of Vireo Health, a publicly traded, multi-state, physician-led medical cannabis company. He's also co-author of the book Medical Cannabis Primer for Healthcare Providers. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss cannabis as a therapeutic agent and alternative to opioids and disrupting the tobacco space. We also cover the coming influx of capital, banking reform excitement, and why the MSO space has been brutalized. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
